io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.api.spi

Interface HalResourceLoader

  • Functional Interface:
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.

    @FunctionalInterface
 @ConsumerType
public interface HalResourceLoader
    An interface to delegate the actual loading and caching of a JSON+HAL resource via HTTP to any other HTTP client library

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Single<HalResponse> getHalResource(String uri) 

    • Method Detail

      • getHalResource

        io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Single<HalResponse> getHalResource(String uri)
        Parameters:
        uri - the URI of the resource to load. The exact format of the URI (i.e. whether it is fully qualified or not) depends on how the links are represented in the upstream resources
        Returns:
        a Single that emits a HalResponse entity if the request was successful, or otherwise fails with a HalApiClientException
